description: A community of scientists interested in education and applied research. Most recently, they organised the Arab AI summit.
An independent media outlet covering technology and society.
A community of AI enthusiasts promoting AI capacity building.
A non-profit organization that works for the promotion and implementation of the open source principles and digital rights in Jordan.

An independent non-profit science institution that specialize in science-related research, policy, and education. Recently, it launched a capacity building program for students titled “Data Intensive Science”.

entity_name: King Hussein School of Computing - Princess Sumaya University of Technology
description: Offers an MSc in Data Science.

entity_name: King Abdullah II School of Information Technology - University of Jordan
description: Programs with specialisation in AI.

entity_name: Faculty of AI - Al-Balqa` Applied University
description: First faculty dedicated to AI in Jordan.
A seed investment company and business accelerator in MENA in the Tech and Creative Industry spaces.

A network for Entrepreneurs, Finance Entrepreneurs and Angel Investors that aims to promote the entrepreneurial ecosystem. It includes some funding programs for Jordanian startups, usually through its angel investor network.
A venture capital firm that partners with entrepreneurs to solve global-scale problems.
A venture capital firm focused on technology, product and design.
A $5M fund that invests in technology startups.
A private sector managed fund making investments in innovative startups and early stage SMEs, with contributions by the World Bank & Jordan’s Central Bank.
A tech accelerator with limited investments.
An accelerator in the north of Jordan, aims to support and enable entrepreneurs in creating sustainable businesses related to the manufacturing/hardware sector.
Venture capital firm that invests in information technology startups.

entity_name: Ministry of Digital Economy and Entrepreneurship
description: The Jordanian ministry responsible for the ICT sector, in addition to digital economy and entrepreneurship. Currently, the ministry is drafting a national AI policy.
An intelligent Arabic chatbot to help businesses improve customer experience and deliver an enjoyable journey using AI.
A set of specialized chatbots that enable hotels to offer better and smoother customer experience.
An AI-based Arabic personal voice assistant.
An AI company specialized in building virtual agents and chatbots. Labiba is now based in UAE.
A central hub for genuine local experiences that uses AI for its travel recommendation engine and chat bot.

Impact analysis solution that enables organization to aggregate data from different sources and track impact based on key indicators in real-time. Whiyse raised funding to leverage AI for better results.
A service to match employers and employees quickly and accurately using AI.
A company that provides complete solutions for industrial tasks including Quality Control and Non Destructive Testing based on computer vision and AI.

A company that aims to simplify the process of building AI applications through introducing a cloud-based, visual development platform to empower businesses to build, train, and deploy AI-powered applications.
A classified platform that uses machine learning for recommendations.
A consulting firm that gives recommendations based on data analysis using data science techniques.
Weather forecasting company that utilises AI technology to improve its prediction technologies.
Technology company building real-time payment solutions some of which are built using AI.
